```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)

library(tidyverse)
library(grid)
library(ggmosaic)
data(cancer)
happy <- data(happy)
happy <- head(happy, n = 10)
```

# height <- P(A)

- Borrowed from ggmosaic

```{r}
ggplot(data = happy) + 
  geom_bloc(aes(width = P(health), fill = health))
```

# x <- A, height <- P(A)

## continuous

- discrete: geom_bar (but can't call it yet)
- continuous: geom_histogram

```{r}
ggplot(data= cancer) + 
  geom_bloc(aes(x = test, 
              height = P(.), # height = P(test)
              fill = (test)),
            binwidth = 1)
```


## discrete

```{r}
ggplot(data= cancer) + 
  geom_bloc(aes(x = discrete(test), 
              height = P(.), # height = P(test)
              fill = (test)),
            binwidth = 1)
```
